channel.title: git on Andrew's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in git on Andrew's Blog

item.title: Git Tips and Tricks
item.description: Push Push the local new branch into the new remote branch: git push <remote-name> <local-branch-name>:<remote-branch-name> Delete remote git branch: git push origin --delete branch_name Pull & fetch Delete local stale git branches which were alreay deleted on the remote server: git fetch -p Fetch the new git branch and checkout into it: git fetch origin <remote-branch-name>:<local-branch-name> git checkout <local-branch-name> or the shortest variant: git checkout -b local_branch_name origin/remote_branch_name Add sub module:
